name: Beams and Flowers 2
description:
A challenging puzzle with blocks, lasers, mirrors ...

Revamped version of Beams and Flowers with auroriax fork of Puzzlescript.

40 levels including the tutorial.

Keyboard control : arrow keys to move, X or space for action, Z to undo, R to restart, Esc for level select.

Mouse control: drag the robot, left click on the same row or column to trigger an action in that direction.
